SELECT * FROM members WHERE mid=#{mid} AND memail=#{memail}

mapper.select: SELECT m.mid, m.mname, m.mpwd, m.mphone, m.memail, to_char(m.mregdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') mregdate, m.mpoint, g.gname FROM members m,grade g WHERE m.gnum = g.gnum AND m.mid=#{mid}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM coupon WHERE mid=#{mid} AND coupon_status = '사용안함'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT q.qna_num, q.mid, q.qna_category_num, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.anwser, q.qna_date, qc.qna_category_name FROM qnaboard q,qna_category qc WHERE q.qna_category_num = qc.qna_category_num AND q.mid = #{mid} ORDER BY qna_date DESC )AA )WHERE rnum>=#{startRow} AND rnum<=#{endRow}

SELECT q.qna_num, q.mid, q.qna_category_num, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.anwser, to_char(q.qna_date,'yyyy/mm/dd hh:mi') qna_date, to_char(q.anwser_date,'yyyy/mm/dd hh:mi') anwser_date, qc.qna_category_name FROM qnaboard q,qna_category qc WHERE q.qna_category_num = qc.qna_category_num AND q.qna_num = #{qna_num}
SELECT coupon_num, mid, coupon_name, coupon_saletype, coupon_status, making_date, coupon_typenum FROM coupon WHERE mid=#{mid} ORDER BY making_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qnaboard WHERE mid = #{mid}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,rownum rnum FROM ( SELECT b.booking_num, TO_CHAR(b.start_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') start_date, TO_CHAR(b.end_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') end_date, b.book_status, h.house_num, h.company, himg.house_save_name, r.roomname FROM house h, house_img himg, rooms r, booking_table b WHERE h.house_num = himg.house_num AND h.house_num = r.house_num AND r.room_num = b.room_num AND b.mid = 'parkm422' ORDER BY b.books_date DESC )AA )WHERE rnum>=#{startRow} AND rnum<=#{endRow}
